code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import Select from'react-select';import{StyledHeaderDiv}from"../../SharedComponents";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Selector=_ref=>{let{data,handleSelectChange,selectedOption}=_ref;const[values,setValues]=useState([]);const notToTake=["psw_reset_codes","it_chat_ids","access_logs","event_logger","salts","secrets"];useEffect(()=>{const filteredKeys=Object.keys(data).filter(key=>!notToTake.includes(key));setValues(filteredKeys.map(key=>({value:key,label:key})));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(StyledHeaderDiv,{className:"selector-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Seleziona la tabella dal men\xF9 a tendina"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Select,{options:values,isMulti:false,value:selectedOption,placeholder:"Seleziona la tabella che vorresti vedere...",onChange:handleSelectChange})]})});};export default Selector;
